subject: Concussions
Football
lead_paragraph: Tight end Tony Scheffler, who was released by the Detroit Lions in October, said he was retiring from the N.F.L. because he had three concussions over the past four years.
snippet: Tight end Tony Scheffler, who was released by the Detroit Lions in October, said he was retiring from the N.F.L. because he had three concussions over the past four years.
